08
答 题 讨 论
01
（多选）中国特色社会主义的总任务是( ) ？
A. 实现社会主义现代化
B. 中华民族伟大复兴
C. 全面建成小康社会
D. 发展社会主义市场经济
（点击选项查看答案）
02
（多选）中国特色社会主义事业“五位一体”总体布局是（ ）？

08
Question & Answer
01
(Multiple choices) The general task of socialism with Chinese characteristics is to ( )?
A. reach socialist modernization
B. achieve the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation
C. build a moderately prosperous society in all respects
D. develop socialist market economy
(Click on the choice for the answer)
02
(Multiple choices) What is the five-sphere integrated overall plan for building socialism with Chinese characteristics( )?
